name: post-requestSubjectErasure
description: Sends the PSP reference containing the shopper data that should be deleted.

forceErasure.description: Set this to **true** if you want to delete shopper-related data, even if the shopper has an existing recurring transaction. This only deletes the shopper-related data for the specific payment, but does not cancel the existing recurring transaction.

pspReference.description: The PSP reference of the payment. We will delete all shopper-related data for this payment.

$ul: **result**: The result of this operation.
**errorCode**: The error code mapped to the error message.
**errorType**: The category of the error.
**message**: A short explanation of the issue.
**pspReference**: The PSP reference of the payment.
**status**: The HTTP response status.
